welcomeMessage: Choose your adventure in immersive stories

stories.title: Kell's Co-ed Conundrum
stories.subtitle: Campus Romance
stories.marketingCopy: Navigate the complex social dynamics of college life as Kell discovers unexpected attractions and difficult choices.

stories.title: Midnight Masquerade
stories.subtitle: Victorian Seduction
stories.marketingCopy: Behind elegant masks lie dangerous desires. Who can you trust at the most exclusive ball of the season?

stories.title: Office Affairs
stories.subtitle: Corporate Temptation
stories.marketingCopy: Power dynamics shift when professional boundaries blur. Navigate workplace romance with career-defining consequences.

stories.title: Quantum Echo
stories.subtitle: White Room Mystery
stories.marketingCopy: Reality bends and time fractures in this mind-bending sci-fi thriller. Wake up in a white room with no memory - your choices determine the truth.

stories.title: Quantum Entanglement
stories.subtitle: Reality Bends
stories.marketingCopy: When parallel universes collide, your choices reshape the fabric of reality itself. Which timeline will survive?

stories.title: Mars Colony Alpha
stories.subtitle: Red Planet Politics
stories.marketingCopy: Lead humanity's first permanent settlement on Mars. Balance survival, politics, and the discovery of ancient secrets.

stories.title: The Haunted Inheritance
stories.subtitle: Gothic Mystery
stories.marketingCopy: You've inherited a Victorian mansion with a deadly secret. Some doors should never be opened...

stories.title: Digital Nightmare
stories.subtitle: Cyber Horror
stories.marketingCopy: Trapped in a virtual reality that's becoming too real. Can you escape before the code consumes your mind?
